PAGE_SHIFT.prompt: Enter left-shift amount representing page size (if 10 page size will be 1024)

KERNEL_STACK_SIZE.prompt: Enter size of kernel stack in bytes

KERNEL_STACK_LIMIT.prompt: Enter top address of kernel stack

KERNEL_DYNAMIC_SIZE.prompt: Enter size of kernel heap memory in bytes

SHARED_REGION_SIZE.prompt: Enter size of shared memory in bytes

USER_HEAP_SIZE.prompt: Enter heap size of user process in bytes

USER_MAX_CACHE_SIZE.prompt: Enter cache size of user process in bytes

USER_MIN_STACK.prompt: Enter per-thread stack size at minimum

USE_XMEM.prompt: whether external memory is used or not
